name: Parkcore (joleman11)
description:
A simple platformer with an expressionate character that reacts depending on what you do.

This is not meant to be a difficult game, the 'Simple' level is only there to test out the mechanics.

[Default Controls]
Move Left - A
Move Right - D
Sprint - Shift
Jump / Double Jump / Wall Jump - Space
Pause - Enter

Give feedback if possible.
